title: After Acquittal, Qatar Detains U.S. Couple In Daughter's Death
teaser: Matthew and Grace Huang have spent almost a year in a Qatari prison, over the death of their 8-year-old adopted daughter earlier last year. On their way home, the Huang's were detained again.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
